price: Bigatuma iyo asomewe Aayah zacu za Qor’ani, azihakana yivuye inyuma, agashoka avuga ati: “Qor'ani, ni imigani n’ibitito vy’ab’aho hambere[2].
arabic: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
footnotes: [2] Izi Aayah rero, n’aho zahishuwe zinebagura bamwe mu babangikanyamana; nka Waliid mwene Al-Mughiira, zirihaniza umwislamu uwo ari we wese ko yogira inyifato zigayitse nk’izo.

meta.transliteration: idhā tut'lā ʿalayhi āyātunā qāla asāṭīru al-awalīna
